preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN ( select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ( 'Tendai Mwenye', 'Faith Zikali', 'Felistas Sungwa', 'Lawrence Munemo', 'Cathlyn Manjengwa', 'Vincent Kareko', 'Mavis Makurira', 'Daniel Pitiseni' ) and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED" ) AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "Provider name for Enhanced adherence counselling");
